question: Do A folios specialize in covering specific B sections?

method.description: Jaccard similarity of A folio MIDDLE vocabulary against each B section vocabulary, then cluster A folios by reach vectors
method.scope: Currier A folios vs Currier B sections

verdict_detail: A folios cover all B sections uniformly (generic pool). ARI=-0.0069 < 0.05, entropy ratio=0.946 near 1.0, pairwise reach similarity std=0.0031 very low. Consistent with C846 (shared vocabulary pool).
pass_criteria: ARI > 0.10, p < 0.05; A folios specialize in specific B sections
fail_criteria: A folios cover all B sections uniformly (generic pool, C846)
